price: Na mwezi tumeupimia vituo, mpaka unakuwa kama karara kongwe.
arabic: وَٱلۡقَمَرَ قَدَّرۡنَٰهُ مَنَازِلَ حَتَّىٰ عَادَ كَٱلۡعُرۡجُونِ ٱلۡقَدِيمِ
footnotes: Na mwezi kwa mpango wetu tumeujaalia una vituo vyake. Mwanzo wa mwezi unakuwa mdogo na mwembamba. Kisha kila usiku unazidi kukua mpaka unatimia kuwa mbaamwezi. Tena unaingia kupungua vile vile, mpaka ukawa kama karara la mtende linapo kuwa kongwe limepindana na limekuwa manjano.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wal-qamara qaddarnāhu manāzila ḥattā ʿāda kal-ʿur'jūni al-qadīmi
